page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: Our twelve squares are mostly urban residential areas.There is a fair amount of wood and park lands spread mostly in the Highgate and Finsbury park areas.The houses are predominantly Victorian although there is a small Georgian village and several council estates.We have no very large shopping precincts,only several assorted small shops.These are easily accessible via bus and train services. Also many roads run through the shopping areas including the controversial A1(Archway Road.) For the many people in this area the facilities are fairly good,providing sports grounds,health services and other community requirements.However , some of the area is better off than the rest,the further West you go the more affluent the society but the East has a lower standard of living.
